title: Kalpataru Projects International board okays to raise Rs 300 crore through NCDs
description: A total of 30,000 NCDs of face value of Rs 1,00,000 each, aggregating to Rs 300 crore is proposed to be issued, a BSE filing stated.Kalpataru Projects International board okays to raise Rs 300 crore through NCDs
content: Kalpataru Projects International on Monday said its board has approved the proposal to raise Rs 300 crore through the issuance of Non-convertible Debentures (NCDs) on private placement basis. A total of 30,000 NCDs of face value of Rs 1,00,000 each, aggregating to Rs 300 crore is proposed to be issued, a BSE filing stated. According to the filing, the Executive Committee of the Board of Directors at its meeting held today has approved the issuance of unsecured, rated, listed, redeemable, non-convertible debentures of Rs 300 crore on private placement basis. The coupon/interest offered is 8.35 per cent per annum.
